mapper.sql: user_id, user_account, user_pass, user_name, user_pinyin, user_tel, sex, birthday, city, avatar_url, org_id, post_id, create_user, create_time, last_time, passup_time, status, del_flag
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (user_id, user_account, user_pass, user_name, user_pinyin, user_tel, sex, birthday, city, avatar_url, org_id, post_id, create_user, create_time, last_time, passup_time, status, del_flag) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatarUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{lastTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{passupTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update sys_user
user_account = #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_pass = #{userPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_pinyin = #{userPinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_tel = #{userTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
avatar_url = #{avatarUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
post_id = #{postId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE},
last_time = #{lastTime,jdbcType=DATE},
passup_time = #{passupTime,jdbcType=DATE},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_user set user_account = #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_pass = #{userPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_pinyin = #{userPinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_tel = #{userTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatar_url = #{avatarUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_id = #{postId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, last_time = #{lastTime,jdbcType=DATE}, passup_time = #{passupTime,jdbcType=DATE}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select u.user_name,u.user_id,u.avatar_url,p.post_name from sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_post p ON u.post_id = p.post_id where u.user_name like CONCAT('%', #{userNameAndPinyin}, '%') or u.user_pinyin like CONCAT('%', #{userNameAndPinyin}, '%')

select u.user_id as userId, u.user_name as userName, u.avatar_url as avatarUrl, u.user_tel as userTel, p.project_name as projectName, p.project_id as projectId, p.id, p.post, p.into_time as intoTime, s.top_name as topName from sys_user u inner join pro_project_user p inner join sys_org s on u.user_id = p.user_id and u.org_id = s.org_id where u.user_id = #{userId} order by p.into_time desc
select u.user_name as userName, u.user_id as userId, u.avatar_url as avatarUrl, u.user_pinyin as userPinyin, s.post_name as post from sys_user u inner join sys_post s on u.post_id = s.post_id
